alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 12:39PM AKST until November 26 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...Winter Weather Advisories for Snow Accumulation Remain in Place for Portions of the Northern Alaska Panhandle... .A gale force low over the northeastern Gulf of Alaska continues to push a front in across the Southeast Alaska Panhandle today. This front will bring periods of heavier snowfall to several locations, including Yakutat, Gustavus, Haines, Skagway and Juneau where colder air is in place. The areas to see greatest amounts of snowfall from 3 to 5 inches will be the Haines area and Juneau, with Yakutat expected to switch back to rain for a period of time this evening resulting in lower snow accumulation amounts. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
